ITEM.label: params: Scilab tlist, Scicos diagram parameters data structure defined
ITEM.SP: by the formal name 'params' and containing the following fields:

ITEM.label: Xshift
ITEM.SP: : real scalar, diagram drawing x offset within Scicos editor window

ITEM.label: Yshift
ITEM.SP: : real scalar, diagram drawing y offset within Scicos editor window

ITEM.label: title
ITEM.SP: : character string, diagram title and default name of save file name

ITEM.label: tol
ITEM.SP: : 1 x 4 vector [atol,rtol,ttol,maxt], where atol, rtol are respectively absolute and relative tolerances for the ode solver, ttol is the minimal distance between to different events time and maxt is maximum integration time interval for a single call to the ode solver.

ITEM.label: tf
ITEM.SP: : real scalar, final time for simulation.

ITEM.label: context
ITEM.SP: : vector of character strings, Scilab instructions used to define Scilab variables used in block definitions as symbolic parameters.

ITEM.label: Color3D
ITEM.SP: : vector with three entries [R,G,B]. defines the color of 3D shape

ITEM.label: doc
ITEM.SP: : user defined diagram documentation structure, default value is list()
